text: Maheshwari Amma (25 February 1948 â€“ 22 February 2022), better known by her stage name K. P. A. C. Lalitha, was an Indian actress. She won two National Film Awards in 1990 and 2000 for her roles in Amaram and Shantham. Lalitha was born in Kayamkulam, India. Her career began in 1968. Lalitha died on 22 February 2022 at a hospital in Thrippunithura, India from problems caused by diabetes and liver disease, three days before her 74th birthday. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1948 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths from diabetes Category:Deaths from liver disease Category:Indian movie actors Category:Indian television actors Category:Indian stage actors
title: K. P. A. C Lalitha
